name: Running Gun
description:
Made in 8 days from scratch, using SFML and C++.

In the dry desert, there is no water, yet it rains scorpions. You play as a cowboy named Marty, you defend your town against a demonic bull who has brought this plague to your people.

Controls

Arrow keys to move. Z to Jump, X to shoot

Recommended:

Listen to Running Gun while playing, since the game doesn't have a soundtrack.

Real pro players don't take any damage. ;)
